mapper.select:
SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.contentnohtml, n.status, qgq_category.category, n.time_zone, n.news_date, n.clicks, n.create_date from qgq_news n left join qgq_category on n.fk_categoryid = qgq_category.id where n.del!=1
and `title` like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and `news_date` >= #{startTime} and n.status = '已发布状态'
and #{endTime} >= `news_date` and n.status = '已发布状态'
ORDER BY n.create_date desc
SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.news_date, fk_categoryid, n.contentnohtml, n.time_zone, n.create_user, n.create_date FROM qgq_news n WHERE n.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qgq_news ( id, title, content, contentnohtml, status,fk_categoryid, time_zone, clicks, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{title},#{content}, #{contentnohtml}, '编辑状态',#{fk_categoryid}, #{timeZone}, '0', #{createDate}, #{createUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser.id}, '0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE qgq_news m SET m.title = #{title}, m.content = #{content}, m.contentnohtml = #{contentnohtml}, m.fk_categoryid = #{fk_categoryid}, m.time_zone=#{timeZone}, m.update_date = #{updateDate}, m.update_user = #{updateUser.id} WHERE m.id = #{id}
